#Command Format:
#[Data Count]:[Flags,Command]:[Periph Device, Address]:[Data(ignored for reads)]

#Ping
00000000:00000000:12345678:FEDCBA98

#Write to Memory
00000002:00010001:00000000:01234567
89ABCDEF

#Enable SD Host
00000000:00000001:01000000:00000001
#Select SD Card (Move to Command mode)
00000000:00000001:01000006:00000000
00000000:00000001:01000007:00010000
#Sleep, Wait for Command to finish

00000400
#Disable
00000000:00000001:01000007:00000000
00000400

#Enable 1.8V
00000000:00000001:01000006:01FFFFFF
00000000:00000001:01000007:00010005
#Sleep, Wait for Command to finish
00000800

#Request and Address
00000000:00000001:01000006:00000000
00000000:00000001:01000007:00010003
#Sleep, Wait for Command to finish
00000800

#Enable Card, Go to Command Mode
00000000:00000001:01000006:00010000
00000000:00000001:01000007:00010007
#Sleep, Wait for Command to finish
00000800

#Initiate a multibyte write command
00000000:00000001:01000006:80000008
00000000:00000001:01000007:00010035
#Sleep, Wait for Command to finish

00000400
00000000:00000001:01000000:00000025
00000000:00000001:01000003:00000002
00000000:00000001:0100000D:00000008
00000000:00000001:01000000:00000065
00000400


00000000:00000001:01000022:00000010
00000400

00000000:00000001:01000022:00000005
00000400


##Read two peices of data from peripheral 1 address 1 (Data is a filler)
#00000002:00000002:01000001:00000000
#
##Sleep
#00000010
#
##Read one (1 and 0 are the same for data count) from peripheral 1 address 0
#00000001:00000002:01000000:00000000
